title: 26.01.2026: Republic Day celebrated at Maharashtra Lok Bhavan
content:
# 26.01.2026: Republic Day celebrated at Maharashtra Lok Bhavan

**Publish Date :January 26, 2026**

---

Republic Day celebrated at Maharashtra Lok Bhavan

Secretary to the Governor of Maharashtra Dr. Prashant Narnaware unfurled the National Tricolour on the occasion of the 77th Republic Day at Lok  Bhavan Mumbai on Monday (26 Jan).

The officers and staff of Lok Bhavan, along with a platoon of the State Reserve Police Force, including police officers and jawans sang the National Anthem.

The Secretary to the Governor Dr. Prashant Narnaware exchanged Republic Day greetings with all those present and distributed sweets to the children of staff and officers.

A company of the SRPF and State Police sang the National Anthem and saluted the flag.

Joint Secretary to the Governor S. Ramamoorthy, Comptroller of the Governor’s Households Dr Nishikant Deshpande, ADC to the Governor Abhaysinha Deshmukh, ADC to the Governor Lt.  Vikram Kumar, officers and staff of Lok Bhavan were present on this occasion

The  Republic Day Message of the Hon’ble Governor of Maharashtra and Gujarat Acharya Devvrat  will be broadcast by Mumbai Doordarshan (DD Sahyadri) at 8.30 am on Monday, 26 January 2026. Akashvani (Asmita Vahini) will  broadcast the message at 9.00 am on 26th January.

The  Republic Day Message of the Hon’ble Governor can be seen from below link

https://www.youtube.com/live/Q-ZJbdHgGIY
